name: FAMILY DOLLAR STORES, INC., petitioner, v. Luanna SCOTT, et al.
name_abbreviation: Family Dollar Stores, Inc. v. Scott

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
FAMILY DOLLAR STORES, INC., petitioner,
v.
Luanna SCOTT, et al.
attorneys: Motion of the Retail Litigation Center, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
FAMILY DOLLAR STORES, INC., petitioner,
v.
Luanna SCOTT, et al.
No. 13-899.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 30, 2014.
Case below, 733 F.3d 105.
Motion of the Retail Litigation Center, Inc. for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
